title: The Fourth Circle of Hell
description: A mysterious assassin murders the Italian Ambassador in his Washington D.C. Embassy at midnight. Before the Ambassador died, he sent a cryptic email containing hidden clues about an amazing secret. The clues lead Smithsonian expert Joe Richmond in a race against time to find the key before sinister forces can destroy it forever. And solving the clues requires Leonardo da Vinci’s 'Saper Vedere' or 'knowing how to see.’ A wickedly smart epic thriller that will challenge you at every turn.
author: Gary Rappard
